sections.title: Unchained Rogue (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Unchained Rogue class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple weapons plus hand crossbow, rapier, sap, short sword, and shortbow, as well as light armor but not shields.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Deals extra precision damage (starting at 1d6, increasing by 1d6 every 2 levels) when the target is denied Dex bonus to AC or when flanking, with a 30-foot range limit for ranged attacks.

sections.title: Trapfinding (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Adds half rogue level (minimum +1) to Perception checks to locate traps and Disable Device checks, and allows disarming magic traps.

sections.title: Finesse Training (Ex) (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Grants Weapon Finesse as a bonus feat at 1st level, and allows adding Dex modifier to damage rolls with selected finesse weapons starting at 3rd level.

sections.title: Evasion (Ex) (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Takes no damage on successful Reflex saves against attacks that normally deal half damage, but only works in light armor or no armor and not while helpless.

sections.title: Rogue Talents (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Gains special abilities called rogue talents starting at 2nd level and every 2 levels thereafter, with some talents adding effects to sneak attacks.

sections.title: Danger Sense (Ex) (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Provides scaling bonuses to Reflex saves against traps, dodge bonus to AC against trap attacks, and Perception checks to avoid surprise, starting at +1 and increasing every 3 levels.

sections.title: Debilitating Injury (Ex) (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Applies additional penalties (bewildered, disoriented, or hampered) for 1 round when dealing sneak attack damage, with penalties increasing at 10th and 16th level.

sections.title: Uncanny Dodge (Ex) (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Prevents being caught flat-footed and retains Dex bonus to AC against invisible attackers, but can still be feinted and loses Dex bonus when immobilized.

sections.title: Rogue’s Edge (Ex) (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Gains skill unlock powers for one skill at 5th level and additional skills at 10th, 15th, and 20th levels, providing abilities beyond normal skill boundaries.

sections.title: Improved Uncanny Dodge (Ex) (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Cannot be flanked, preventing sneak attacks from flanking unless the attacker has 4+ more rogue levels than the target.

sections.title: Advanced Talents (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Allows selecting more powerful advanced talents in place of regular rogue talents starting at 10th level and every 2 levels thereafter.

sections.title: Master Strike (Ex) (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Adds sleep (1d4 hours), paralysis (2d6 rounds), or death effects to sneak attacks with a Fortitude save to negate, usable once per creature per 24 hours.

sections.title: Masterful Talent (Ex) (Unchained Rogue)
sections.description: Grants a +4 bonus on all skill checks, representing the rogue's mastery across diverse areas of expertise.
